title: Apple â€” Apple scab
description: A fungal disease causing olive-green to brown scabby lesions on leaves and fruit; favored by cool, wet weather. Remove fallen leaves and apply appropriate fungicides during wet periods.

treatment.chemical: Apply fungicides such as captan or myclobutanil at green tip and repeat as needed.
treatment.organic: Remove fallen leaves, use sulfur-based sprays, and improve air circulation.
